com.appriskgame.controller

Class MapValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appriskgame.controller.MapValidation

  • public class MapValidation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to check the format of List of continents, List of countries, adjacency between countries which are present in the uploaded file and validate the map.
    Author:
    Surya, Sai

      • validateContinents

        public boolean validateContinents(java.lang.String tagData,
                                  java.lang.String type)
        This method is used to validate the list of continents which are present in the uploaded file and check the correct format.
        Parameters:
        tagData - Value of the continent tag
        type - map type
        Returns:
        flag to check if entered continents are valid

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • validateMapConquest

        public boolean validateMapConquest(java.lang.String fileName)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method validates the map which is loaded and stores the details of valid data in the form of GameMap object.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of file which will be loaded.
        Returns:
        flag To check if file content is valid.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws for input output

      • validatemetadata

        public boolean validatemetadata(java.lang.String tagData)
        This method aims validate list of map tag data available in the uploaded file and checks if they are in correct format.
        Parameters:
        tagData - Value of the map tag data
        Returns:
        flag of type boolean determines if the entered map tags are valid
